大家好，

協助轉知聖母醫護管理專科學校辦理之ESG 初階管理師種子師資培訓及認證班訊息如附。有意參加者，請自行報名參加。謝謝。

Dear  all,

This email is forwarding the ESG training course that will be held by St. Mary's Junior College of Medicine, Nursing and Management.  If you are interested in participating, kindly register on your own. Thank you very much.

Have a nice day.
